definition:
An integer that is both a Smarandache-Wellin number in a given base $b$
and a prime number.

References

R. Crandall and C. Pomerance, Prime Numbers: A Computational
Perspective, Springer, NY, 2001: 72

H. Ibstedt, A Few Smarandache Sequences, Smarandache Notions Journal,
Vol. 8, No. 1-2-3, 1997: 170 - 183
